title: A sermon preached before the House of Peers in the Abbey of Westminster, on the 5th of November, 1689, being Gun-Powder Treason-Day, as likewise the day of His Majesties landing in England by the Right Reverend Father in God Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Half title: The Bishop of Salisbury's sermon before the Lords, November 5th, 1689.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
